text: Jonben is an unincorporated community and coal town within the Winding Gulf Coalfield and is located within Raleigh County, West Virginia. ==History== The town was founded by John Tolley and Benjamin Meadows. Their Post Office closed in July 2005.http://webpmt.usps.gov/pmt003.cfm == References == Category:Unincorporated communities in Raleigh County, West Virginia Category:Unincorporated communities in West Virginia Category:Coal towns in West Virginia
title: Jonben, West Virginia
